LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.label: strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は強力な背筋力を持っているので,一般的な人よりも[PAWN_objective]沢山運ぶことができるようになります.
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.label: very strong back
LanguageData.FT_StrongBack.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は非常に強力な背筋力を持っており, [PAWN_pronoun]は一般的な人よりもはるかに多くのものを運ぶことができるので,[PAWN_pronoun]はラバか何かのように扱われるでしょう.
LanguageData.FT_Bandolier.degreeDatas.0.label: bandolier
LanguageData.FT_Bandolier.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]はまるで装弾ベルトです.[PAWN_pronoun]は,遠距離射撃武器を再装填するために余分な弾薬を手元に抱えているのが好きです.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.label: enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は健康状態で,頑強な性格を持っています. [PAWN_pronoun]は,他の人よりも高ストレス状況に耐えることに優れています.
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.label: very enduring
LanguageData.FT_Endurance.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は,並外れた健康状態と非常に頑強な性格を持っています.[PAWN_pronoun]は,他の人が耐えられないような高ストレスの状況に耐えることに優れています.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.label: charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]にはカリスマ性があります.[PAWN_pronoun]は社交的な交渉や取引が得意です.
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.label: very charismatic
LanguageData.FT_Charisma.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は大変カリスマ性に優れています.[PAWN_pronoun]は社交的な交渉や取引が得意です.
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.label: intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]は威圧的な性格を持っており,これは [PAWN_objective]に社会的な交渉を有利にします.
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.label: very intimidating
LanguageData.FT_Intimidation.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]は非常に威圧的な性格を持っており,これは[PAWN_objective]に社会的な交渉で大きく有利に働きます。
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.label: poor aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は手と目の連携が悪く,戦闘で [PAWN_possessive]狙っている目標を外すことが多くなります.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.label: steady aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は手と目の連携が良好で,戦闘で[PAWN_possessive]狙っている目標を外すことが少なくなります.
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.2.label: great aim
LanguageData.FT_AimOffset.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は手と目の連携がとても高く, [PAWN_possessive]狙っている目標を外すことがとても少なくなります.
LanguageData.FT_Artisan.degreeDatas.0.label: artisan
LanguageData.FT_Artisan.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は芸術的な技巧を持った熟練した職人で, [PAWN_pronoun]は物を組み立てるのが好きで,[PAWN_pronoun]はそれがかなり得意です.
LanguageData.FT_IronStomach.degreeDatas.0.label: iron stomach
LanguageData.FT_IronStomach.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は丈夫な胃を持っています.[PAWN_pronoun]は長時間食事を取らなくても大丈夫ですし,[PAWN_possessive]胃が荒れるにはもっと時間がかかります.
LanguageData.FT_Packing.degreeDatas.0.label: packin' light
LanguageData.FT_Packing.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は荷物を軽くします.[PAWN_pronoun]は,持ち運べる量が少なくなりますが,移動速度が速くなります.
LanguageData.FT_Packing.degreeDatas.1.label: pack rat
LanguageData.FT_Packing.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は収集魔で,[PAWN_pronoun]は,後で役立つ可能性がある,ほぼすべての品を抱えます.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.label: agile
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は反射神経が優秀で,身体の動きも滑らかです.[PAWN_pronoun]は近接戦闘でさらに多くの攻撃から身をかわせるでしょう.
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.label: ninja
LanguageData.FT_Agility.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]は反射神経が強力で,まるで忍者のように動けます.[PAWN_pronoun]は近接戦闘でさらに多くの攻撃から身をかわせるでしょう.
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.label: intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is more intelligent than average. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.label: very intelligent
LanguageData.FT_Intelligence.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is very intelligent. [PAWN_pronoun] learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.label: Perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a good awareness of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a good understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.label: very perceptive
LanguageData.FT_Perception.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings and has a great understanding of how [PAWN_possessive] actions affects others.
LanguageData.FT_Evasion.degreeDatas.0.label: dodgy
LanguageData.FT_Evasion.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at doging things. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
LanguageData.FT_Evasion.degreeDatas.1.label: evasive
LanguageData.FT_Evasion.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at avading things. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
LanguageData.FT_Scientific.degreeDatas.0.label: scientific
LanguageData.FT_Scientific.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good researcher and a fast learner.
LanguageData.FT_Scientific.degreeDatas.1.label: very scientific
LanguageData.FT_Scientific.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very scientific mind. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great researcher and a fast learner.
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.0.label: traveler
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at traveling. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.1.label: explorer
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at exploration. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.2.label: adventurer
LanguageData.FT_Adventuring.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at adventuring. [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
LanguageData.FT_Bargaining.degreeDatas.0.label: bargainer
LanguageData.FT_Bargaining.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is great at bargaining. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
LanguageData.FT_Bargaining.degreeDatas.1.label: hard bargainer
LanguageData.FT_Bargaining.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hard bargainer. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.0.label: uninspiring
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an uninspiring personality. [PAWN_pronoun] has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.1.label: inspirational
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.2.label: very inspirational
LanguageData.FT_Inspiration.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a very inspirational personality. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
LanguageData.FT_Generosity.degreeDatas.0.label: generous
LanguageData.FT_Generosity.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should.
LanguageData.FT_Generosity.degreeDatas.1.label: overly generous
LanguageData.FT_Generosity.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an overly generous person to a fault. [PAWN_pronoun] is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than [PAWN_pronoun] should
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.label: scrapper
LanguageData.FT_Scrapper.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is good at working with scrap metal. [PAWN_pronoun] is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
LanguageData.FT_NaturalLeader.degreeDatas.0.label: natural leader
LanguageData.FT_NaturalLeader.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural leader, [PAWN_pronoun] is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.label: rad resistant
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.1.label: rad tolerant
LanguageData.FT_RadResistant.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef]'s body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.label: action boy
LanguageData.FT_ActionBoy.degreeDatas.0.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.label: action girl
LanguageData.FT_ActionGirl.degreeDatas.0.description: There's no time to waste! [PAWN_nameDef] has increased movement and work speed.
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.label: quick hands
LanguageData.FT_QuickHands.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has quick hands. When it comes to [PAWN_possessive] hands, [PAWN_nameDef] never hesitates.
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.label: gun nut
LanguageData.FT_GunNut.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gun nut, [PAWN_pronoun] loves guns so much that [PAWN_pronoun] gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.label: scrounger
LanguageData.FT_Scrounger.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see [PAWN_pronoun] eat!
LanguageData.FT_SturdyFrame.degreeDatas.0.label: sturdy frame
LanguageData.FT_SturdyFrame.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a sturdy frame. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and it takes more to bring [PAWN_objective] down.
LanguageData.FT_Survivalist.degreeDatas.0.label: survivalist
LanguageData.FT_Survivalist.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is survialist. [PAWN_pronoun] has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
LanguageData.FT_Blitz.degreeDatas.0.label: blitz
LanguageData.FT_Blitz.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] finds the gap to make the tackle! [PAWN_pronoun] moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
LanguageData.FT_Philanthropist.degreeDatas.0.label: philanthropist
LanguageData.FT_Philanthropist.degreeDatas.0.descript: [PAWN_nameDef] is a philanthropist. [PAWN_pronoun] is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
LanguageData.FT_HealingHands.degreeDatas.0.label: healing hands
LanguageData.FT_HealingHands.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on [PAWN_possessive] healing touch.
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.label: rooted
LanguageData.FT_Rooted.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part tree! It takes more to bring [PAWN_nameDef] down but also more to get [PAWN_objective] moving.
LanguageData.FT_LeadBelly.degreeDatas.0.label: lead belly
LanguageData.FT_LeadBelly.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a lead belly. [PAWN_possessive] belly can go much longer without food and [PAWN_pronoun] is more resistant to toxic radiation.
LanguageData.FT_BearArms.degreeDatas.0.label: bear arms
LanguageData.FT_BearArms.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has bear arms. [PAWN_pronoun] can carry more and [PAWN_possessive] arms pack more of a punch!
LanguageData.FT_Serendipitous.degreeDatas.0.label: serendipitous
LanguageData.FT_Serendipitous.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef]は運がよく,[PAWN_pronoun]は非常に幸運なので,そのことは[PAWN_objective]とても満足させています.
LanguageData.FT_GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.label: green thumb
LanguageData.FT_GreenThumb.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for gardening. [PAWN_pronoun] is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields while harvesting them.
LanguageData.FT_Tenderizer.degreeDatas.0.label: tenderizer
LanguageData.FT_Tenderizer.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a tenderizer! [PAWN_pronoun] has a passion for beating meat into submission.
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.label: fortune finder
LanguageData.FT_FortuneFinder.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] seems to discover hidden wealth where ever [PAWN_pronoun] goes.
LanguageData.FT_BountifulButcher.degreeDatas.0.label: bountiful butcher
LanguageData.FT_BountifulButcher.degreeDatas.0.descri: [PAWN_nameDef] is a bountiful butcher! [PAWN_pronoun] isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what [PAWN_pronoun] wants.
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.label: animal friend
LanguageData.FT_AnimalFriend.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for animals. [PAWN_pronoun] is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. [PAWN_nameDef] refuses to hunt animals.
LanguageData.FT_Magnetic.degreeDatas.0.label: magnetic
LanguageData.FT_Magnetic.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow [PAWN_pronoun] able to use [PAWN_possessive] attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
LanguageData.FT_LifeGiver.degreeDatas.0.label: life giver
LanguageData.FT_LifeGiver.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have [PAWN_possessive]'s expertise keeping them alive.
LanguageData.FT_SpiritualHealer.degreeDatas.0.label: spiritual healer
LanguageData.FT_SpiritualHealer.degreeDatas.0.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is a spiritual healer, [PAWN_pronoun] is a great doctor with good social skills. [PAWN_nameDef] loves to grow and make [PAWN_possessive] own medicine.
LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.label: frail back
LanguageData.FT_FrailBack.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.label: ghoulish
LanguageData.FT_Ghoulish.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is still human, mostly. [PAWN_pronoun] is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but [PAWN_possessive] ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.label: idiot savant
LanguageData.FT_IdiotSavant.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't stupid! [PAWN_pronoun] is just... different. [PAWN_pronoun] works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.label: stupid
LanguageData.FT_Stupid.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very smart. [PAWN_pronoun] can mess up doing just about anything.
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.label: oblivious
LanguageData.FT_Oblivious.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] isn't very aware of [PAWN_possessive] surroundings, or anything at all really. [PAWN_pronoun]
LanguageData.FT_Woodchucker.degreeDatas.0.label: woodchucker
LanguageData.FT_Woodchucker.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is part woodchuck! [PAWN_pronoun] wants everyone to believe [PAWN_possessive] great woodworking is because [PAWN_possessive] work ethic but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
LanguageData.FT_WreckingBall.degreeDatas.0.label: wrecking ball
LanguageData.FT_WreckingBall.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is a wrecking ball! [PAWN_pronoun] can push through building material like it's not even there. [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't know [PAWN_possessive] own strength, often breaking things during construction.
LanguageData.FT_Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.label: perfectionist
LanguageData.FT_Perfectionist.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] is a perfectionist with a passion for art. [PAWN_pronoun] is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because [PAWN_pronoun] puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
LanguageData.FT_IronFist.degreeDatas.0.label: iron fist
LanguageData.FT_IronFist.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an iron fist! [PAWN_pronoun] can punch through foes like they are not even there. [PAWN_nameDef] has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
